content.raw:
Ok so we ran into a bug today caused by the changes from this pull request:

We changed some unit conversion parameters and suddenly all fron panel settings were gone after recompiling the connection table.

This is dues to the fact, that `Connection.parent` now is of type unicode instead of `Connection`. This causes a exception to be thrown in `FronPanelSettings.handle_return_code` as it tried to access `connection.parent.name` which then leads to `FrontPanelSettings.restore` failing.
content.html:
Ok so we ran into a bug today caused by the changes from this pull request:

We changed some unit conversion parameters and suddenly all fron panel settings were gone after recompiling the connection table.

This is dues to the fact, that Connection.parent now is of type unicode instead of Connection. This causes a exception to be thrown in FronPanelSettings.handle_return_code as it tried to access connection.parent.name which then leads to FrontPanelSettings.restore failing.
